Eris's Evil Thoughts:
The printing Sacred, storing Solina's Hall, consists of 4 Policemen and 4 Security Stones. Policemen received blessing - while Security Stones work, they are impregnable. That them to win, it is necessary to dismantle 4 Security Stones. Business this difficult, but other method to meet Solina isn't present.
